message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand your offer of $8000, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for it. How about we meet in the middle at $9000? It's still a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm still not sure if I want to go up to $9000. How about we try $7500? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go.
I understand your hesitation, but I think the product is really worth more than $7500. How about we try $8200? It's still a good compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I'm still not convinced that $8200 is a good deal for me. I'm willing to go up to $7000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. How about we try $8100? It's still a good compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I'm getting close to walking away from this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $7500. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your urgency, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $7500. How about we try $8050? It's still a good compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I'm not willing to go any higher. I think we've gone back and forth enough. I'm going to have to walk away from this deal. I'll consider buying from John for $10000 instead.
